# Module 11  Way of life
##### VI. 阅读理解
CAABC
##### VII. 书面表达(示例,共82词)
China is a country with a long history. It has got something different from
Western countries. First, Chinese people often greet. They are paying attention
to others' eating. We ask them, “Did you eat?” Next, having meals is important.
For lunch and dinner, Chinese people need to wait olds starting meal. And do not
take too much food. Last but not least, is accepting presents. Chinese people
use both two hands to take presents. And they do not open the presents
immediately.
# Module 12  Help
### 重点单词(“/”分隔所有可能)
1\. glass  2. stair  3. help / save  4. bottom  
5\. problem / matter  6. lift  7. train  8. earthquake  
9\. inner / inside  10. window  11. electron / power  12. imagine / imagination  
13\. drop  14. cover  15. warn  16. keep  
17\. broken  18. medical  19. wrong  20. harmful  
21\. calm  22. brave  23. helpful  24. clean  
25\. under  
**词汇拓展**  
1\. broken  2. medical  3. harmful / harmless  
4\. helpful / helpless  5. kept kept
### 重点短语(“/”分隔所有可能)
1\. first aid  2. have trouble doing sth. / have trouble in doing sth.  
3\. first of all / at once  4. lift up  
5\. be harmful (with …)  6. make sure  
7\. cover A with B  8. don't touch … / do not touch …  
9\. warn sb. …  10. jump down from … / jump off from …  
11\. stop doing sth.  12. keep calm  
13\. be careful …  14. in a word  
15\. be hit  16. be proud of …  
17\. keep away …  18. so … that …
### 能力训练
##### I. 单项选择
A)  BAACC  
B)  BCBCC
##### II. 词汇(答案为完整单词)(“/”分隔所有可能)
A)  1. harmful  2. Calm  3. brave  4. trouble  5. imagine  
B)  6. lying  7. medicine / medical  8. arrives  9. serious  10. to get
##### III. 句型转换(每空一词)
1\. Call  
2\. Don't jump  
3\. Where did hide  
4\. What is  
5\. so good that
##### IV. 根据汉语意思完成句子(“/”分隔所有可能)
1\. are proud of  
2\. warn;of  
3\. Keep away from;Don't touch / Stay away from;Don't touch / Keep away from;Do not touch / Stay away from;Do not touch  
4\. Make sure;Cover;with  
5\. In a word
##### V. 完形填空
BCBAA BBACC
##### VI. 阅读理解
CCBAC
##### VII. 摆烂
###### Let's have a ……
# 八年级下册
# Module 1  Feeling and impressions
### 重点单词(“/”分隔所有可能)
1\. smell  2. cookie  3. pizza  4. try  
5\. pie  6. salt  7. jam  8. proud  
9\. ear  10. glasses  11. jeans  12. stranger  
13\. message  14. hobby  15. score / [point](https://iamrege.github.io/thereiszuoye/releases/english/9/point) / mark  16. love  
17\. sound  18. soft  19. sour  20. lovely / cute  
21\. done  22. nervous  23. blond / blonde / golden  24. pretty  
25\. favourite / favorite  
**词汇拓展**  
1\. stranger  2. love / lovely  3. done / undone
### 重点短语(“/”分隔所有可能)
1\. afraid …  2. afraid to do sth.  
3\. afraid of (doing) sth.  4. can't wait to do sth.  
5\. be proud of …  6. be proud to do sth.  
7\. be proud of …  8. each other  
9\. have try  10. be on  
11\. in correct way / in right way  12. be excited with …  
13\. shake hands  14. close to …  
15\. get to / arrive in / arrive at  16. hear from … / receive a letter from … / get a letter from …  
17\. thank sb. to (do) sth.  18. spend time/money doing …  
19\. spend time/money on sth.
### 能力训练
##### I. 单项选择
A)  BACBA  
B)  ABCCA
##### II. 词汇(答案为完整单词)
A)  1. hobby  2. nervous  3. message  4. stranger  5. proud  
B)  6. chosen  7. proud  8. beginning  9. second  10. saw
##### III. 句型转换(每空一词)(“/”分隔所有可能)
1\. How delicious  
2\. Would you like / Do you want  
3\. What feel about / How feel about  
4\. heard from  
5\. How does taste
##### IV. 根据汉语意思完成句子(“/”分隔所有可能)
1\. What's;like;strict with / What is;like;strict with / How's;不填;strict with / How is;不填;strict with  
2\. can't wait to  
3\. loves eating sweet food;is harmful to / loves to eat sweet food;is harmful to / have a sweet tooth;is harmful to  
4\. good marks;are proud of  
5\. spend;playing / spend;on playing / spend;in playing
##### V. 完形填空
BABCA BACCA
##### VI. 阅读理解
CBACA
##### VII. 摆烂
# Module 2  Experinces
### 重点单词(“/”分隔所有可能)
1\. match / game / competition  2. prize  3. dream  4. Germany  
5\. France  6. tower  7. king  8. queen  
9\. Arabic  10. way  11. join  12. afford  
13\. invite / invitation  14. move  15. send  16. mix  
17\. miss  18. count / number  19. before  20. ancient  
**词汇拓展**  
1\. competition  2. Germany  3. France  
4\. Arabic  5. sent sent
### 重点短语(“/”分隔所有可能)
1\. invite …  2. make up  
3\. go with …  4. first prize  
5\. until now / so far  6. work on  
7\. expect to  8. … is different / … differ  
9\. count down  10. send sb. to do sth.  
11\. join competition / take part in competition  12. write down  
13\. around the world / travel around the world  14. a fifteen-year-old boy / a 15-year-old boy  
15\. one of the …
### 能力训练
##### I. 单项选择
A)  CABCA  
B)  ABAAC
##### II. 词汇(答案为完整单词)
A)  1. count  2. dream  3. ancient  4. afford  5. queen  
B)  6. will take  7. our  8. photos  9. visiting  10. safety
##### III. 句型转换(每空一词)
1\. has cleaned  
2\. Have taken  
3\. haven't seen yet  
4\. had fun  
5\. How many times
##### IV. 根据汉语意思完成句子(“/”分隔所有可能)
1\. So far / Until now  
2\. dreams  
3\. be honest;making up  
4\. looking forward to seeing / expecting to see  
5\. has gone to;have;been to
##### V. 补全短文
FBADG
##### VI. 阅读理解
CCBBB
##### VII. 摆烂
# Module 3  Journey to space
### 重点单词(“/”分隔所有可能)
1\. earth  2. moon  3. news  4. planet  
5\. reach / get / arrive  6. model  7. spaceship  8. project  
9\. astronaut  10. environment  11. system  12. group  
13\. galaxy  14. universe  15. light  16. find / discover  
17\. connect / communicate / communication  18. recent / latest / nearest / closest  19. solar  20. impossible  
21\. nobody  
**词汇拓展**  
1\. communication  2. discovery  3. impossible  
4\. later latest
### 重点短语(“/”分隔所有可能)
1\. no problem  2. latest news  
3\. send … to …  4. get information  
5\. far from …  6. to … / in order to  
7\. space travel  8. go on the Internet  
9\. searchh for / look for  10. hundreds of  
11\. billions of / thousands of millions of  12. go around …  
13\. solar system  14. communicate with …
### 能力训练
##### I. 单项选择
A)  ACCBA  
B)  ABCBC
##### II. 词汇(答案为完整单词)
A)  1. around  2. universe  3. astronaut  4. spaceship  5. communicate  
B)  6. goes  7. biggest  8. flying  9. their  10. best
##### III. 句型转换(每空一词)(“/”分隔所有可能)
1\. hasn't seen yet  
2\. Have started yet  
3\. got to / arrived in
